Description: Four manufacturers of paper products agreed to a $1.2 million settlement -- $350,000 in cash and $850,000 in paper products -- to resolve price-fixing allegations brought by New York, Maryland and West Virginia. The settle did not specify how the amount was to be divided up among the four companies; here we assume the total was split evenly among them.
Info Source: https://web.archive.org/web/20100214053711/http://www.ag.ny.gov/media_center/2000/jun/jun06a_00.html
